trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il controllo che ridistribuisce lo spazio tra le colonne o righe di un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo GridSplitter ridistribuisce lo spazio tra righe o colonne in un oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>senza modificare le dimensioni di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a GridSplitter resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando un oggetto GridSplitter ridimensiona due colonne, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>della proprietà di una colonna viene incrementato allo stesso tempo la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>della stessa quantità della proprietà di altra colonna è ridotto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical GridSplitter by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente viene illustrato come definire un oggetto GridSplitter orizzontale o verticale impostando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>proprietà e lasciando la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>sono impostate sui valori predefiniti.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter type|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Resizes rows|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |Resizes columns|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: **Come creare controlli GridSplitter verticali e orizzontali** | Tipo di oggetto GridSplitter | valore <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>| valore <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | Ridimensiona le righe | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Ridimensiona le colonne | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| | Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>è maggiore o uguale a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, ridimensiona le colonne.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| A GridSplitter can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>è minore di <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, ridimensiona le righe. | <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>| <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| Un oggetto GridSplitter può sovrapporsi a una riga o colonna che contiene altre informazioni, o può occupare una riga o colonna da se stesso.</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a GridSplitter, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su come definire un oggetto GridSplitter, vedere [procedura: ridimensionare le righe con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [procedura: ridimensionare le colonne con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired GridSplitter behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>le impostazioni delle proprietà non consentono di ottenere il comportamento di GridSplitter desiderato, è possibile modificare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>le impostazioni delle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GridSplitter may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto GridSplitter può essere nascosto da altri oggetti contenuti nella <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>raccolta di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su come evitare questa situazione, vedere [procedura: verificare che un oggetto GridSplitter sia visibile](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Proprietà di dipendenza per questo controllo potrebbe essere impostata dallo stile predefinito del controllo.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Se una proprietà viene impostata da uno stile predefinito, la proprietà può variare rispetto al valore predefinito quando il controllo viene visualizzato nell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Lo stile predefinito è determinato dal tema del desktop viene utilizzato quando l'applicazione è in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [temi WPF predefiniti](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la distanza minima che un utente è necessario trascinare il mouse per ridimensionare righe o colonne con un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by DragIncrement is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: La distanza minima che è definita da DragIncrement viene reinizializzata continuamente mentre l'utente trascina il mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the DragIncrement amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando si trascina il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>dalla quantità DragIncrement, le righe o colonne vengono ridimensionate.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: Per ridimensionare le righe e colonne di altre, è necessario trascinare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>della stessa quantità.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the DragIncrement.
trans-unit.target: Modifica di conseguenza, le dimensioni delle colonne e righe che vengono eseguite utilizzando il mouse o tastiera per spostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>vengono effettuate in multipli del DragIncrement.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Un valore che rappresenta la distanza minima che un utente deve utilizzare il mouse per trascinare un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> per ridimensionare righe o colonne.

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 1.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la distanza che ogni premere un tasto di direzione consente di spostare un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: La distanza che il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> sposta per ogni premere un tasto di direzione.

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è 10.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Crea l'implementazione di <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"> </xref> per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando viene premuto un tasto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> perde lo stato attivo della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Risponde a una modifica nelle dimensioni del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controllo determina il tipo di puntatore da visualizzare dopo il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Size>è impostata.</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Informazioni sulla modifica delle dimensioni del <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile che consente di personalizzare l'aspetto, effetti o altre caratteristiche di stile per il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> indicatore di anteprima del controllo che viene visualizzato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>è impostata su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Quando si impostano gli stili, esistono alcune restrizioni.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [stili e modelli](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # Utilizzo dell'attributo XAML ``` ``` # # valori XAML `ResourceExtension` uno dei seguenti: `StaticResource` o `DynamicResource`.

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Vedere [risorse XAML](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`La chiave che identifica lo stile richiesto.

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave fa riferimento a una risorsa esistente in un <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > La sintassi degli elementi è tecnicamente possibile, ma non consigliato.

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Vedere [stili Inline e modelli](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: Un'associazione di riferimento utilizzando o <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>è anche possibile, ma non comune.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None | Anteprima delle modifiche ai limiti di riga o colonna viene visualizzata quando l'utente trascina il (controllo) e è impostata su `true`.

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'utente rilascia il pulsante del mouse, vengono impostati i limiti di riga e colonna.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> dimensions as you move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Windows.Style"> </xref> per l'indicatore di anteprima che visualizza il rischio potenziale di modifica apportata alla <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> dimensioni mentre si sposta il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è lo stile che fornisce il tema corrente.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le colonne o righe vengono ridimensionate rispetto alla colonna o riga per il quale il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo definito.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>che ridimensiona le righe o colonne, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or ResizeBehavior default values.
trans-unit.target: Se non è possibile ottenere il comportamento desiderato impostando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>proprietà, cambiano il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>o valori predefiniti ResizeBehavior.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: ridimensionare le righe con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [procedura: ridimensionare le colonne con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che indica quali colonne o righe vengono ridimensionate da questo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: L'identificatore per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo Ridimensiona le righe o colonne.

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Per specificare un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>che ridimensiona le righe o colonne, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the ResizeDirection or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: Se non è possibile ottenere il comportamento desiderato impostando il <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>proprietà, cambiano il ResizeDirection o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>i valori predefiniti.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [procedura: ridimensionare le righe con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [procedura: ridimensionare le colonne con un oggetto GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che specifica se ridimensionare righe o colonne.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> controllo Aggiorna le dimensioni di colonna o riga mentre l'utente trascina il controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>richiede un <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>oggetto deve essere presente nella relativa struttura ad albero padre per visualizzare i commenti e suggerimenti anteprima trascinare.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: Questo requisito viene generalmente soddisfatto dal <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>oggetto disponibile nello stile predefinito per il <xref:System.Windows.Window>o nel <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>oggetto creato da un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se nessuno di questi è disponibile, il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controllo deve definire un proprio <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| When the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: # # Informazioni proprietà di dipendenza | | | |-|-| | Campo dell'identificatore | | | Impostare le proprietà dei metadati su `true`| None | Quando è impostata la proprietà ShowsPreview `true`, viene visualizzata un'anteprima della modifica di dimensioni di riga o colonna.

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Le dimensioni effettive le modifiche quando il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>viene rilasciato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà è impostata su `false`, le dimensioni di colonna o riga vengono aggiornate in tempo reale mentre l'utente trascina il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza la tastiera per spostare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>dimensioni di riga, colonna o controllo, vengono aggiornate in tempo reale, anche se la proprietà ShowsPreview è impostata su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> preview is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref> anteprima viene visualizzata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>proprietà di dipendenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
